SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddedNewChart
A chart component that displays the number of new cards added per day over a specified range.
AlgorithmHiperparameter
Custom annotation used to mark fields as algorithm hyperparameters.
AllowedValues
Annotation to specify the allowed values for a field.
AppearanceTimeRegularRevisionChart
A chart component that displays the number of cards scheduled for regular revision over a specified range of days.
AppearanceTimeReverseRevisionChart
A chart component that displays the number of cards scheduled for reverse revision over a specified range of days.
AppLocaleSetting
Represents the locale settings for the application, including language and country information.
AppLocaleSettingRepository
Repository interface for managing AppLocaleSetting entities.
AppUser
Represents a user of the application.
AppUserRepository
Repository interface for managing AppUser entities.
AppUserService
Service class for managing users and authentication operations.
AppView
The `AppView` class serves as an abstract base class for all views (panels) in the application.
AuthorsView
The `AuthorsView` class represents a view displaying the author and year information.
CardBase
Represents the base class for a card in a revision system.
CardBaseRepository
Repository interface for managing CardBase entities.
CardBaseRevision
Represents a record of a card revision event.
CardBaseRevisionRepository
Repository interface for managing CardBaseRevision entities.
CardCell
A custom JPanel representing a card in a deck, displaying the front and back of the card, along with buttons to edit or delete the card.
CardConstantCoefficient
Represents a card that uses constant coefficients for calculating revision times.
CardRevisionService
Service class responsible for handling the revision of cards, both regular and reverse.
CardRevisionType
Enum representing the types of revision that can be applied to a card.
CardService
Service class for managing CardBase entities and related operations.
CardSuperMemo2
Represents a card that uses the SuperMemo2 algorithm for spaced repetition.
ChartService
Service class responsible for managing chart generation and translation of available ranges and chart types.
ConstantCoefficientRevisionAlgorithm
Represents a revision algorithm that uses constant coefficients to adjust the revision time and track the number of incorrect answers.
DeckBase
Represents a deck of cards used in a spaced repetition system.
DeckBaseRepository
Repository interface for managing DeckBase entities.
DeckBaseStatistics
Represents statistical data related to the usage and performance of a deck in a spaced repetition system.
DeckBaseStatisticsRepository
Repository interface for managing DeckBaseStatistics entities.
DeckCell
A custom JPanel representing a deck in the user interface, displaying deck details and providing options to open, delete, or export the deck.
DeckMenuPanel
A custom JPanel representing a menu for deck-related actions, including adding cards, browsing the deck, revising cards, viewing settings, viewing statistics, and closing the menu.
DeckService
Service class responsible for managing decks and cards.
DeckStatisticsService
Service class responsible for managing deck statistics.
DecksView
The `DecksView` class represents the main view where all the decks associated with a user are displayed.
FieldValueValidator
Utility class for validating field values against annotations like NotNull, NotEmpty, Min, Max, and AllowedValues.
LanguageSelectionView
The view responsible for selecting the application's language.
LoginView
The `LoginView` class represents the login and registration screen.
Main
The main entry point of the application.
MainFrame
Main application frame which manages the display of views and the application menu.
MainFrameViews
Enum representing different views in the main application frame.
Max
Annotation to specify the maximum allowed value for a numeric field.
MessageConfig
Configuration class for message resources.
Min
Annotation to specify the minimum allowed value for a numeric field.
NewDeckView
The `NewDeckView` class represents the view for creating a new deck.
NotEmpty
Annotation to specify that a field cannot be empty.
NotNull
Annotation to specify that a field cannot be null.
NumberTextField
A custom JTextField that allows only positive integers to be entered.
RegularRevisionChart
A chart component that displays the number of cards scheduled for regular revision over a specified range of days.
ReverseRevisionChart
A chart component that displays the number of cards scheduled for reverse revision over a specified range of days.
RevisedForTheFirstTimeChart
A chart component that displays the number of cards revised for the first time over a specified range of days.
RevisionAddCardView
A view allowing users to add new cards to a deck manually or by importing from a CSV file.
RevisionAlgorithm<T>
Abstract class representing a revision algorithm for cards.
RevisionAlgorithmRepository
Repository interface for managing RevisionAlgorithm entities.
RevisionAlgorithmService
Service responsible for managing revision algorithms, including loading them dynamically from the classpath and creating instances.
RevisionEditCardView
A view that allows users to edit existing cards in a deck.
RevisionRegularView
A view that facilitates the regular revision of cards from a deck.
RevisionReverseView
A view that facilitates the reverse revision of cards from a deck.
RevisionSearchView
A view that allows users to search for cards within a deck.
RevisionSettingsView
A view for adjusting and saving the hyperparameters of a deck's revision algorithm.
RevisionStatisticsView
A view for displaying revision statistics in the form of charts.
RevisionView
The view responsible for managing card revisions.
SpringContext
Utility class for accessing Spring's application context.
StatisticsChart
An abstract class representing a statistics chart for decks.
SuperMemo2RevisionAlgorithm
A revision algorithm based on the SuperMemo2 method for spaced repetition.
TranslationService
Service responsible for handling translations and managing locale settings.
TrashDeckCell
A custom JPanel representing a deleted deck in the trash view, displaying the deck's name and providing buttons to restore or permanently delete the deck.
TrashView
The `TrashView` class represents the user interface for managing deleted decks.
